text: Ra juna duhkha usale bhogisakeko cha, tyasa pascata usala'i yadi hamile aphno dayalutako rasasvadana gara'umchaum bhane usale niscaya nai bhandacha ki ‘‘yo ta mero haka nai ho. Ma ta yo thandina ki tyo, kayamata hunecha ra yadi ma aphno rabatira pharke tai pani avasya nai usako pasama mero nimti ramro paritosika hunecha.’’ Niscaya nai hamile uniharula'i jasale inkara gare avasya bata'era nai chadchaum, je–jati uniharule gareka chana. Ra hamile uniharula'i avasya nai kathora yatanako svada cakha'une chaum
